description.value:
You jump through an enemy's space, possibly rendering them off balance. You [[/act leap]] horizontally. During this movement, you can try to move through the space of one enemy. Attempt an @Check[athletics|against:reflex] check against the enemy's Reflex DC as soon as you try to enter its space.

Critical Success You move through the enemy's space. If you don't have enough Speed to move all the way through its space, you get the same effect as a failure. The enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of your turn.

Success As critical success, except the enemy isn't off-guard.

Failure Your movement ends, and you trigger reaction as if you had moved out of the square you started in.

Critical Failure As failure, but you first fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} before triggering reactions.
